list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: making sure of avoiding potential danger, mishap, or harm; cautious.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I begged him to be more careful
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi cầu xin anh ấy cẩn thận hơn
